description: Identifier of the saved query/report this column configuration belongs to.
Source data field selected to appear in the query output for this column.
Display order index of this column within the query results.
Preferred display width for the column, typically measured in pixels or characters, used by the UI.
Label shown in the query header for this column; may differ from the source field name.
User account that created this column configuration.
Timestamp when this column configuration was created.
User account that last modified this column configuration.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this column configuration.
Underlying data type of the column’s values, used for validation, formatting, and sorting.
Indicates whether this column is shown in the query output.
Priority or sequence number for sorting by this column; negative or unspecified values likely mean no sorting; confirm with SME.
Flag to calculate and display subtotal values for this column within grouped results.
Specifies whether the sort direction for this column is descending when sorting is enabled.
Controls grouping of results on this column (e.g., group breaks or sections); some codes likely indicate special group types; confirm with SME.
Controls inclusion and type of grand-total aggregation for this column (e.g., none, sum, average); specific codes require confirmation with SME.
Optional formula used to compute the column’s value instead of using a single source field.
Determines how codes and descriptions are labeled in output (e.g., show code, description, or both).
Indicates whether this column participates in result sorting per the defined sort sequence and direction.
Display format string applied to the column’s values (e.g., date pattern, number precision, currency) for consistent presentation.
